name: 2024 The 17th International Conference on Computer and Electrical Engineering
content: Publication: Accepted papers will be included in Journal of Physics: Conference Series (doi:10.1088/issn.1742-6596 ; Online ISSN: 1742-6596 / Print ISSN: 1742-6588) and indexed by Scopus, Ei Compendex, Inspec(IET),etc.
